A Journey Born from Passion

Born in the Himalayas

Welcome to Ngimalaya Adventure Nepal, where the journey begins with a name rooted in the rich cultural heritage of the Sherpa community. I am Ngima Nuru Sherpa, born into the heart of the Himalayas and having spent two decades as a seasoned trekking guide.

Multilingual Guide

My passion for exploration has connected me with diverse cultures and people across the globe. Proficient in 6 languages including English, German, Japanese, Hindi, Nepali, and Sherpa, my extensive career has allowed me to traverse not only the stunning landscapes of Nepal but also venture into the vibrant tapestries of Japan and Germany.

Founded on Passion

Fueled by the desire to share the mesmerizing views of the Himalayas and the diverse cultures within Nepal, I founded Ngimalaya Adventure Nepal in 2016. Our commitment goes beyond conventional trekking experiences, as we strive to provide personalized plans, warm Nepali welcomes, and a team of experts dedicated to making every trekking adventure unforgettable.

"
Ngimalaya Adventure Nepal – Where Culture Meets the Clouds, and Every Trek Tells a Story!
Ngima Nuru Sherpa

Founder & Chief Adventure Guide

Popular Destinations

Discover Nepal's most spectacular trekking routes with expert guidance and personalized service

Showing 6 treks

Moderate
4.8

Annapurna Base Camp Trek

Journey into the heart of the Annapurna massif through diverse landscapes and traditional Gurung villages. Experience the spectacular amphitheater of towering peaks at Annapurna Base Camp.

14 Days
4,130m (13,549ft)
1-12 people
Season: Sep-Nov, Mar-May (Best: Oct-Nov, Mar-Apr)
$1,350per person
Challenging
4.8

Everest Base Camp Trek

The most iconic trek in Nepal, leading to the base camp of the world's highest mountain. Experience breathtaking views of Everest, Lhotse, Nuptse, and Ama Dablam while immersing yourself in rich Sherpa culture.

16 Days
5,364m (17,598ft)
2-12 people
Season: Oct-Nov, Mar-May (Best: Oct-Nov)
$1,899per person
Strenuous
4.8

EBC Trek via Gokyo/Cho-La

The ultimate Everest region adventure combining Everest Base Camp with the stunning Gokyo Lakes and crossing the challenging Cho La Pass. Experience the best of Khumbu in one epic journey.

18 Days
5,545m (18,193ft)
2-8 people
Season: Oct-Nov, Mar-May (Best: Oct-Nov)
$2,299per person
Strenuous
4.8

Manaslu Circuit Trek

Trek around the magnificent Manaslu, the eighth highest mountain in the world. This less-crowded alternative to Annapurna Circuit offers pristine wilderness, authentic Tibetan culture, and spectacular mountain views.

18 Days
5,160m (16,929ft)
2-10 people
Season: Sep-Nov, Mar-May (Best: Oct-Nov, Mar-Apr)
$1,699per person
Strenuous
4.8

Kanchenjunga Circuit Trek

The ultimate wilderness adventure to the base camps of Kanchenjunga, the third highest mountain in the world. This remote and challenging trek offers pristine natural beauty, rich biodiversity, and authentic cultural experiences in one of Nepal's most untouched regions.

25 Days
5,143m (16,874ft)
2-8 people
Season: Oct-Nov, Mar-May (Best: Oct-Nov)
$2,799per person
Strenuous
4.8

Makalu Base Camp Trek

Remote wilderness trek to the base camp of Makalu, the fifth highest mountain in the world. Experience pristine nature and diverse ecosystems.

20 Days
4,870m (15,978ft)
2-8 people
Season: Oct-Nov, Mar-May
$2,599per person

We offer custom trekking packages tailored to your preferences, fitness level, and time constraints. Let us create your dream Himalayan adventure.

Peak Expeditions

Take your adventure to new heights with our 6,000m+ peak expeditions. Perfect for experienced trekkers ready for their next challenge.

Technical Training Included
Safety Equipment Provided
Expert Guides
6,165m

Island Peak (Imja Tse)

Nepal's most popular 6,000m peak, perfect for mountaineering beginners. Combines Everest Base Camp trek with technical climbing.

Key Facts
Max. Altitude:6,165 m
Trip Duration:19 days
Trek Grade:Strenuous Plus
Accommodation:Teahouse
Meals:B, L & D
Transport:Car/Van/Plane
Per day Hiking:5-7 hours
Best Time:Feb-May, Oct-Dec
6,476m

Mera Peak

Nepal's highest trekking peak with stunning panoramic views of five 8,000m peaks including Everest, Lhotse, and Cho Oyu.

Key Facts
Max. Altitude:6,476 m
Trip Duration:18 days
Trek Grade:Strenuous Plus
Accommodation:Teahouse
Meals:B, L & D
Transport:Car/Van/Plane
Per day Hiking:5-7 hours
Best Time:Jan-May, Oct-Dec
6,119m

Lobuche East

Technical climbing peak in the Everest region offering spectacular views and excellent preparation for higher peaks.

Key Facts
Max. Altitude:6,119 m
Trip Duration:20 days
Trek Grade:Strenuous Plus
Accommodation:Teahouse
Meals:B, L & D
Transport:Car/Van/Plane
Per day Hiking:5-7 hours
Best Time:Jan-May, Oct-Dec

Safari Adventures

Discover Nepal's incredible wildlife in pristine national parks and conservation areas. Experience rare animals in their natural habitat with expert naturalist guides.

Expert Naturalist Guides
Conservation Support
Wildlife Photography
UNESCO Site

Chitwan National Park

Home to the rare one-horned rhinoceros and Bengal tigers. Experience jungle safaris, canoe rides, and cultural programs.

2-4 days
Family Friendly
Wild Tiger

Bardia National Park

Nepal's largest and most pristine wilderness area. Best chances to spot wild tigers, elephants, and dolphins.

3-5 days
Adventure
Bird Paradise

Koshi Tappu Reserve

Premier bird watching destination with over 500 species. Perfect for wildlife photography and nature enthusiasts.

2-3 days
Bird Watching

Why Choose Ngimalaya Adventure?

With over two decades of experience and a deep commitment to sustainable tourism, we offer more than just trekking – we provide transformative experiences that connect you with the heart of Nepal's culture and landscapes.
